name: JohnyJohnyYesPapaIndianRhymeUS
0:
”Alexa, ask johny johny yes papa to play”
”Alexa, ask johny johny yes papa to start”
”Alexa, ask johny johny yes papa to begin”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: johny johny yes papa
des:
Johny Johny
(Yes Papa)
Eating sugar?
(No, papa)
Telling lies?
(No, papa)
Open your mouth
(Ah, ah, ah!)
Johny, Johny
(Yes, Papa)
Eating sugar?
(No, papa)
Telling lies?
(No, papa)
Open your mouth
(Ah, ah, ah!)

The Johny Johny Yes Papa Indian Rhyme is famous among children. The audio response in the skill in English. The audio is played for more than 20 minutes so that children remain engaged with the Alexa device.


Session 1:
User: Alexa, ask johny johny yes papa to play
Alexa: johny johny yes papa 1 hour
<Alexa completes the song on user interruption>
User: Alexa, next
User: Alexa, stop
User: Alexa, shuffle
User: Alexa, next / previous
User: Alexa, resume
User: Alexa, start over
User: Yes/No


Session 2:
User: Alexa, ask johny johny yes papa to play
Alexa: You were listening to johny johny yes papa, Would you like to resume?
User: No
Alexa: <Alexa starts over to the start and you can ask Alexa to step forward by saying Alexa, next> You are listening to The johny johny yes papa. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Session 3:
User: Help
Alexa: You are listening to The johny johny yes papa. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

The skill responses in the English language makes it suitable for English listening and speaking audience.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
